answerText: chocobos[10] Chocobos are a recurring species in this RPG video game franchise, which is published by Square Enix. This series' seventh game sees Cloud Strife take on the strongest SOLDIER, Sephiroth.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 2 | 11 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: In one game, one of these creatures is required to reach the optional boss Exodus, while in another game you can race on one of them while trying to hit balloons. For 10 points each:  [10] Name these large, usually yellow birds that are often used as a mode of transportation.  In the twelfth game in the series in which they appear, you can rent them from a little flying creature that likes to say "kupo."
